Preparatory Committee to Commemorate Day of Sun Formed in Britain 
    Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The British preparatory committee to commemorate the Day of the Sun was formed with due ceremony on Mar. 3.
 The ceremony elected Harpal Brar, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful functions including meeting, "Evening of Korean Culture", film show and photo exhibition on the occasions of the Day of the Sun, the 13th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the 74th anniversary of the foundation of the Korean Peopleï¿½fs Army.

articles.content:
Book on DPRK Published in Pakistan 
    Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Book "The Country of the Songun Politics" was brought out in Pakistan to mark the February holiday.
 Present at the book releasing ceremony held in Karachi on Feb. 23 were the secretary for information of the Pakistan People's Party, the former minister of Justice and Parliamentary Affairs and others. 
 Author of the book Zabed Ansari, secretary of the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies, addressing the ceremony, referred to the origin and originality of the Songun politics.    
 The book will help the readers know well about the key to the victory the DPRK has won by firmly defending socialism from the imperialists' reckless moves to isolate and stifle it under the great banner of the Songun politics, he added. 
 Akrak Aktar Hamidi, chairman of the association, said that the Songun politics serves as the most powerful political mode indicating the way of defending sovereignty under the present situation where the U.S. styling itself the world's "only superpower" and its allies are intensifying their moves to stifle the developing countries. He underscored the need for progressive humankind to learn from the Songun politics of   leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.content:
Koreans in China to Commemorate Day of Sun 
    Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee of the General Association of Koreans in China for commemorating the Day of the Sun was held on Mar. 3.
 The ceremony elected Yang Yong Dong, chairman of the association, chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee set a commemoration period from Apr. 10 to 20 and decided to hold colorful functions including meetings, photo and book exhibitions, film shows, art performances, sports and amusement games under the sponsorship of the association and organizations under it in the period.

Foreign Minister Meets Palestinian Ambassador 
    Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun Thursday met and had a talk with Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Mohammad Shahta Zarab who paid a courtesy call on him.

Noted Mineral Water Good for Medical Treatment
    Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The noted Kwandae mineral water wells out on the bank of the Huichon River flowing through Huichon City, Jagang Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
 Its chemical elements good for health remain unchanged from thousands of years ago.
 It is very efficacious for chronic gastritis, stomach and duodenal ulcers, diseases of urogenital system and chronic inflammatory diseases of biliary tract system.
 More than 5,100 liters of the mineral water spring out in the highland of 200 meters above the sea level a day.    
 A lot of people have their diseases treated free of charge at the Huichon Kwandae Mineral Water Sanatorium thanks to the popular health policy of the government.
